pages.text: $(li)Dispensers as the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/dropper)Droppers$(/l) can be used to eject items that are saved in its inventory.$(br)$(li)Unlike $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/dropper)Droppers$(/l), Dispensers will throw specific items, like $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) or Potions.
$(li)They can work with other tools too, like a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/bucket)Bucket$(/l) and a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/flint_and_steel)Flint and Steel$(/l).
